Home.Name: Alexandre BOURDOIS
Home.Description: I am a software engineer specialized in embedded systems, with skills in web development and hardware engineering. Passionate, versatile, and open to new opportunities.
Home.VisitorsThisMonth: Visitors this month on this site

items.description: Embedded software development on ST87M01 module (NBIOT + GNSS). My role was to create customer applications to demonstrate the module's potential.
Digital probe design from CAD to assembly. Reverse Engineering of a Power Inverter. Multi-cultural experience in Malaysia.
Development of a bootloader on STM32 for an IoT security ecosystem. Reverse engineering of optical systems.
Specialized in electronics, embedded systems, and telecommunications, combining technical expertise with management skills through a hands-on apprenticeship program.
Education in electronics, industrial computing, automation, and embedded systems, emphasizing the design and development of innovative solutions.

about.title: About Me
about.bio: Passionate developer with over 3 years of experience, I‚Äôm curious about space, technology, blockchain, and cybersecurity. I love traveling, especially in Asia, and I try to stay active by practicing some sports.

contact.description: I am always looking for exciting projects and enriching collaborations. Whether you have a question, a proposal, or simply want to connect, feel free to reach out!
